meanings.definition: A person who adds decorative red lettering or designs to manuscripts.
meanings.sent1: The rubricator carefully added red designs to the ancient manuscript.
meanings.sent2: The skilled rubricator enhanced the manuscript with beautiful red lettering.
meanings.sent3: The rubricator accidentally spilled red ink all over the manuscript, creating a unique artwork.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch as a rubricator transformed the plain manuscript into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous rubricator's work stood out with vibrant red details.
